Instruction: Slice the baguette into thin rounds and place them on a baking sheet.
Bake the baguette rounds in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
Slice the black grapes in half.
Once the baguette rounds are toasted, spread each with a layer of goat cheese.
Top each crostini with halved black grapes.
Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the grapes are slightly softened.
Remove from the oven and drizzle each crostini with honey.
Serve warm as a delightful appetizer or side dish.
